Class RecordCompactor

    public abstract class RecordCompactor
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordProcessor<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>
    Convenient processor to compact hierarchical data (Json, Xml, etc).
    Author:
    Mahmoud Ben Hassine (mahmoud@benhassine.fr)
